text: Sukhbir may refer to: * Sukhbir (musician) (born 1969), Bhangra singer * Sukhbir (writer) (1925–2012), Punjabi novelist, short-story writer, poet and essayist * Sukhbir Singh Badal (born 1962), Punjabi politician * Sukhbir Singh Gill (born 1975), former field hockey player * Sukhbir Singh Kapoor, writer and educator * Sukhbir Sinha (1868–1928), politician, zamindar and Hindu Mahasabha leader Category:Indian masculine given names
title: Sukhbir
